disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Used to determine the action parameters to use for this weapon's attacks.

sortId.Wiki: The ordering ID used to sort this part in the menu.

wanderingEquipId.Wiki: Replacement part ID for wandering ghosts.

fixPrice.Wiki: The price required to repair this part.

reinforcePrice.Wiki: The reinforcement price for this part.

sellValue.Wiki: The sell value for this part.

correctAgility.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage derived from the specified stat.

correctMagic.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage derived from the specified stat.

correctFaith.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage derived from the specified stat.

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding.

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding.

residentSpEffectId2.Wiki: A SpEffect to apply to the wielder of this weapon.

originEquipWep.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

weakA_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified as Type A.

weakB_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified as Type B.

weakC_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified as Type C.

weakD_DamageRate.Wiki: Damage multiplier applied to targets that are classified as Type D.

vagrantItemLotId.Wiki: -1 No vagrant 0 No lottery 1 With lottery

vagrantItemEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: -1 No drop 0 No lottery 1 With lottery

equipModelId.Wiki: The model ID to use for this part. Also determines the menu preview icon.

iconId.Wiki: The icon ID to use for this part.

durability.Wiki: The initial durability of this part.

durabilityMax.Wiki: The maximum durability of this part.

attackThrowEscape.Wiki: The base damage for throw attack power

parryDamageLife.Wiki: The duration of parry damage. It is capped by the duration set in the TAE. In frames.

saDurability.Wiki: The additional poise to apply when using this weapon during attack animations.

horizontalGuardAngle.Wiki: Defense generation range angle when guarding with a weapon (horizontal direction). In degrees.

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: Defense power against stamina drain from enemy attacks when guarding correctly.

reinforceTypeId.Wiki: The reinforcement progression to use for this part.

trophySGradeId.Wiki: The achievement ID this part is associated with, if any.

trophySeqId.Wiki: The sequential achievement ID this part is associated with, if any.

throwAtkRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to critical hits.

bowDistRate.Wiki: Increase the attentuation range of ammunition by the specified multiplier.

equipModelCategory.Wiki: The equipment model category used by this part.

equipModelGender.Wiki: The equipment gender category used by this part.

weaponCategory.Wiki: The weapon category of this part.

wepmotionCategory.Wiki: The weapon animation category. Determines the base animation set the weapon uses.

guardmotionCategory.Wiki: The weapon animation category used when guarding. Determines the animation set to overlap when guarding.

atkMaterial.Wiki: Specify particles and sounds at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size)

correctType_Physics.Wiki: Determine the calculcation correction graph to use when correcting this specified type of damage.

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to set for attacks

spAtkcategory.Wiki: The weapon override animation category. Determines the override animation set the weapon uses.

wepmotionOneHandId.Wiki: The weapon idle animation category. Determines the idle animations used when held one-handed.

wepmotionBothHandId.Wiki: The weapon idle animation category. Determines the idle animations used when held two-handed.

properStrength.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

properAgility.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

properMagic.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

properFaith.Wiki: The required level of the specified stat to properly wield this weapon.

attackBaseParry.Wiki: The base parry attack damage value. Applied to the enemy parry defense value.

defenseBaseParry.Wiki: The base parry defense value. Compared against enemy parry attack value.

guardBaseRepel.Wiki: The base repel value when guarding. Compared against enemy repel attack value.

attackBaseRepel.Wiki: The base repel value when attacking. Compared against enemy repel attack value.

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Guard cut rate invalidation ratio (-100 to 100) Normal at 0 / Completely invalidated at -100 / Doubles the defense effect of the opponent at 100 -50, 100% cut shield becomes 50% cut Become

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, the guard animation offset to use when being attacked.

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

burnGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

stunGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

highPlasmaGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

curseGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

isDurabilityDivergence.Wiki: The offset to apply to the animation set based on durability.

rightHandEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this part can be equipped in the front right slot.

leftHandEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this part can be equipped in the front left slot.

bothHandEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this part can be equipped in either front slot.

rightBackEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this part can be equipped in the back right slot.

leftBackEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this part can be equipped in the back left slot.

enableGuard.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will guard with L1 when equipped with left hand.

enableParry.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will arry with L2 when equipped with left hand.

enableMagic.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast magic when attacking.

enableSorcery.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast sorcery when attacking.

enableMiracle.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast miracles when attacking.

enableVowMagic.Wiki: If ON, this weapon will cast vow magic when attacking.

isNormalAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isBlowAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isSlashAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isThrustAttackType.Wiki: The attack type for menu display.

isEnhance.Wiki: If ON, this weapon be buffed via a tool.

isHeroPointCorrect.Wiki: If On, applies attack correction based on humanity.

isCustom.Wiki: If ON, this weapon can be reinforced via the reinforcement mechanic?

disableBaseChangeReset.Wiki: If ON, prevents the weapon from being changed fundamentally via the ascension mechanic or infusion mechanic.

disableRepair.Wiki: If ON, this weapon cannot be repaired.

isDarkHand.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is considered a 'Dark Hand'.

simpleModelForDlc.Wiki: If ON, this weapon uses a simple model for the DLC.

lanternWep.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is considered a light source.

isVersusGhostWep.Wiki: If ON, this weapon can hit 'Ghost' characters.

baseChangeCategory.Wiki: The weapon job category (e.g. ascension or infusion). Used to display the attribute icon.

isDragonSlayer.Wiki: If ON, is considered a 'dragon-hunter' weapon.

isDeposit.Wiki: If ON, this item can be deposited into the repository.

disableMultiDropShare.Wiki: If ON, this item cannot be dropped in a multiplayer session.

isDiscard.Wiki: If ON, this item can be discarded.

isDrop.Wiki: If ON, this item can be dropped.

isMissileLockNoRayCast.Wiki: If ON, and this weapon is a missle weapon, then lock-on will work through walls.

isPurgeEnable.Wiki: If ON, this weapon can be 'purged', e.g. dropped and no longer usable for the rest of the mission.

extensionEquipable.Wiki: If ON, this part can be equipped in the core expansion slot.

wepCollidableType0.Wiki: The collidable type for this weapon.

wepCollidableType1.Wiki: The collidable type for this weapon.

absorpParamId.Wiki: The weapon sheath position ID. This value determines the position where the weapon is attached. -1 is the default position.

toughnessCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the current toughness when this weapon is used.

isValidTough_ProtSADmg.AltName: Is Toughness Perfomed if Poise is Initial Value
isValidTough_ProtSADmg.Wiki: If ON, the toughness calculation is performed even if the current armor poise is the initial value.

isDualBlade.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is considered a 'duel blade'.

isAutoEquip.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is automatically equipped. Only valid for arrows and bolts. Requires the slot to be empty to equip.

isEnableEmergencyStep.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is handled as a quickstep weapon in the behavior scripts.

invisibleOnRemo.Wiki: If ON, this weapon is hidden during cutscenes.

guardBreakAtk_IgnoreProtect.Wiki: If ON, this weapon ignores defense after an enemy's guard break.

correctLuck.Wiki: Determine the calculcation correction graph to use when correcting this specified type of damage.

enchantSfxSize.Wiki: ID offset to enchantment SFX ID

wepTypeForText.Wiki: The weapon type to display in the menu.

staminaMax.Wiki: The stamina capacity of this booster.

staminaRecoverPerSec.Wiki: The stamina recovery rate. In points per second.

recoverStaminaDelayTimeSec.Wiki: The delay before stamina recovery starts. In seconds.

guardBreakSelfAtk_AtkId.Wiki: The attack ID To use during a self-induced guard break.

breakThrowTypeId.Wiki: The throw type ID to use after a guard break. -1 disables, enemy ignores this.

stealthThrowTypeId.Wiki: The throw type ID to use after a stealth attack. -1 disables, enemy ignores this.

thrustersParamIDForPC.Wiki: For player, specify the ID of the thruster parameter (0 means no thruster).

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Player vs. player only. Multiplier to the base Energy attack power.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Player vs. player only. Multiplier to the base Explosive attack power.

vsPlayerDmgCorrectRate_DepletedUraniumTo.Wiki: Player vs. player only. Multiplier to the base Depleted Uranium attack power.

attainmentWepStatusStr.Wiki: The STR requirement to change the heavy attack into a special heavy attack with this weapon.

attainmentWepStatusDex.Wiki: The STR requirement to change the heavy attack into a special heavy attack with this weapon.

attainmentWepStatusFai.Wiki: The STR requirement to change the heavy attack into a special heavy attack with this weapon.

attainmentWepStatusLuc.Wiki: The STR requirement to change the heavy attack into a special heavy attack with this weapon.

attackElementCorrectId.Wiki: The attack attribute correction parameters to use when correcting this weapon's damage.

saleValue.Wiki: Price the item is on sale for.

reinforceShopCategory.Wiki: The reinforcement menu category this weapon uses.

maxArrowQuantity.Wiki: The maximum number of this weapon (ammunition) that can be held.

residentSfx_1_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If ON, then weapon particle 1 is hidden if the weapon is Sheathed.

residentSfx_2_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If ON, then weapon particle 2 is hidden if the weapon is Sheathed.

residentSfx_3_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If ON, then weapon particle 3 is hidden if the weapon is Sheathed.

residentSfx_4_IsVisibleForHang.Wiki: If ON, then weapon particle 4 is hidden if the weapon is Sheathed.

isSoulParamIdChange_model0.Wiki: Whether the particle paramters for weapon 1 are applied. Typically this is the 'soul param id' and 'invisible weapon' paramters.

isSoulParamIdChange_model1.Wiki: Whether the particle paramters for weapon 2 are applied. Typically this is the 'soul param id' and 'invisible weapon' paramters.

isSoulParamIdChange_model2.Wiki: Whether the particle paramters for weapon 3 are applied. Typically this is the 'soul param id' and 'invisible weapon' paramters.

isSoulParamIdChange_model3.Wiki: Whether the particle paramters for weapon 4 are applied. Typically this is the 'soul param id' and 'invisible weapon' paramters.

wepSeIdOffset.Wiki: The sound offset ID to apply when this weapon is equipped.

baseChangePrice.Wiki: The price to change the base weapon (e.g. ascension or infusion).

levelSyncCorrectId.Wiki: The correction ID to use for level syncing.

atkStateId.Wiki: The attack state ID for this weapon.

bulletNum.Wiki: Number of rounds loaded per magazine.

magazineReload_InactiveSpeedScale.Wiki: The magazine reload speed during storage.

vsPlayerImpactCorrectRate.Wiki: Player vs. player only. Multiplier to the base Impact attack power.

connectPartsSlotIndex.Wiki: Part number that works with this equipment when it is an enemy

isTaeShootTimingOnly.AltName: Only Fire Bullet via TAE Request
isTaeShootTimingOnly.Wiki: The bullet is actually fired only when a shooting request comes from TAE.

verticalGuardAngle.Wiki: Defense generation range angle when guarding with a weapon (vertical direction). In degrees.

postureBothHandAnimeId.Wiki: The additive animation ID applied to the current animation when this weapon is two-handed.

postureRightHandAnimeId.Wiki: The additive animation ID applied to the current animation when this weapon is right-handed.

postureLeftHandAnimeId.Wiki: The additive animation ID applied to the current animation when this weapon is left-handed.

changeWepParamId.Wiki: The weapon ID to use when changing weapons whilst this weapon is the primary.

lookAtParamId.Wiki: The LookAt param ID to use.

sfxIdAtBreak_0.Wiki: The SFX ID to play when the weapon is destroyed.

sfxIdAtBreak_1.Wiki: The SFX ID to play when the weapon is destroyed.

sfxIdAtBreak_2.Wiki: The SFX ID to play when the weapon is destroyed.

sfxIdAtBreak_DmypolyId_0.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID that generates the particle upon the weapon being destoryed. -1 means no particle is generated.

sfxIdAtBreak_DmypolyId_1.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID that generates the particle upon the weapon being destoryed. -1 means no particle is generated.

sfxIdAtBreak_DmypolyId_2.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID that generates the particle upon the weapon being destoryed. -1 means no particle is generated.

bulletShootDirType.Wiki: The direction to fire bullets in

behaviorJudgeId.Wiki: ChrBehavior control program: If 'Use behavior judgment ID' is not checked for shooting, shoot using the set behavior judgment ID

totalBulletNum.Wiki: Total number of rounds that can be fired. -1 means infinite.

shieldParamId.Wiki: The shield param ID to use when guarding with this weapon. -1 means the weapon's guard parameters are used.

lockRange.Wiki: The lock distance of the weapon. In metres.

meleeAbility.Wiki: Determines the amount of angular velocity correction.

lockSightHeightScale.Wiki: The vertical scale of the lock-on.

lockSightWidthScale.Wiki: The width scale of the lock-on.

lockTimeSec.Wiki: The time to lock-on. In seconds.

bladeHomingParamId.Wiki: The blade homing parameters to use for this weapon.

assembleMenuCategory.Wiki: The assembly menu category for this part.

weaponPoseTypeR.Wiki: The weapon hold type in the right-hand.

weaponPoseTypeL.Wiki: The weapon hold type in the left-hand.

equipPanelIconID.Wiki: The icon ID for the the weapon panel GUI.

consumeEN.Wiki: The energy consumption of this weapon.

categoryNameTextID.Wiki: The text that appears for this category.

pairEquipWep.Wiki: The weapon ID to use if two of these weapons are equipped.

operationPartsId.Wiki: The operation permissions for this weapon.

bulletCost.Wiki: Cost per round fired. At the end of each mission, the total number of rounds fired is used to calculate ammunition expenses.

depletedUraniumToxicPaGuardResistRate.AltName: Pulse Armor - Guard Absorption %: Depleted Uranium
depletedUraniumToxicPaGuardResistRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this weapon is guarding with pulse armor.

weaponAttachObjId.Wiki: The ID of the attachment joint to use for this weapon.

Pulse Armor: Extra-Large Enemy - Coral Hit Ripple
Performance Weakening + HP Drain when Death
Pulse Armor: Large Energy - White Hit Ripple
Pulse Armor: Extra-Large Enemy - Coral Hit Ripple
Allow Automatic Replenishment: Default to Disabled
Allow Automatic Replenishment: Default to Enabled
Maximum number of bullets generated at specified interval
Attack Power * Number of Simultaneous Shots
Attack Power * Max Number of Multi-Stage Hits
Attack Power * Number of Simultaneous Shots * Max Number of Multi-Stage Hits
